title: Average Time Spent On Social Media Daily in Maputo by Age Group
summary: This chart shows the Minutes of at the Average Time Spent On Social Media Daily from Age 15-24 to 55-64 .
\\n From the chart we see that the Minutes of were 150 , at their highest in 45-54 .
\\n The Minutes slowly declined over the next 3 - 4 Age to 74 in 35-44 .
gold: The graph depicts average time ( in minutes ) spent on social media daily , in Maputo , split by age groups . Ages 15 - 24 spent 122 minutes daily , ages 25 - 34 spent 87 minutes daily , ages 35 - 44 spent 83 minutes daily , ages 45 - 54 spent 144 minutes daily , and ages 55 - 64 spent 104 minutes daily . Overall , ages 45 - 54 spent the most time on social media daily , compared to the least amount of time being spent by ages 25 - 34 and ages 35 - 44 equally .
